Posted By: DucksGoMooful (9/11/2012 5:23:11 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: I think that this is one of the most flavorful cards of all time. Normally, Magic showcases the really cool, interesting beings and locations on the plane, such as the [giant dragons](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=230774), [huge evil demons](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=193868), [a gate to unleash planar destroyers](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=197881), or [powerful, triumphant angels](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=253627). However, on any given plane, there are likely to be boring, mundane creatures, such as this, that Magic never shows. Of course, the most exciting things are the epic, powerful cards that make you say "whoa"; nevertheless, it is important to have something to compare these cards to. Cards like this bring a nice dose of reality to an otherwise fantastic game
posts.html:
I think that this is one of the most flavorful cards of all time. Normally, Magic showcases the really cool, interesting beings and locations on the plane, such as the giant dragons, huge evil demons, a gate to unleash planar destroyers, or powerful, triumphant angels. However, on any given plane, there are likely to be boring, mundane creatures, such as this, that Magic never shows. Of course, the most exciting things are the epic, powerful cards that make you say "whoa"; nevertheless, it is important to have something to compare these cards to. Cards like this bring a nice dose of reality to an otherwise fantastic game
